page.title: 17A Day in the Life of.....(1)
page.content: {........................CLASS 4, Age 5 { {IAIN }I get up in the morning and tickle my brother{ {SHIRLEY}I do my exercises every day {JOHN }I yawn then I have breakfast and then I clean my teeth {KELLY }I have cornflakes {JON }I brush my teeth and go down stairs. I put my shoes on and go to school {IAIN }I like working at school {HAYLEY }I have fish & chips for dinner {KELLY }I go home with my mummy {ISABEL }I play with my brother every day and sometimes we play in the garden together on our slide and our swings {JON }I jog every night {JAMES }I always watch television and then I go to bed {EVERYONE}That's what we do in the day.
